synopsis.text: For ging friendships through cooperation takes center stage in this award-winning short film directed by Iku Ogawa. As a first-year project in 2015 at Tokyo University of the Arts' Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation, this claymation masterpiece invites viewers to witness the heartwarming journey of a character determined to make friends. With Romu Aoyagi's captivating music and Misaki Hasuo's immersive sound design, the film has garnered recognition, including the Audience Award at the 17th Bucheon International Animation Festival's Student Film Competition. Prepare to be touched by this endearing tale that beautifully illustrates the importance of collaboration in forming lasting bonds.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
